mapper.update: update report set ep_id = #{epId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, verdict = #{verdict,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, ep_id, doctor_id, start_time, end_time, verdict, content, create_time, update_time from report where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, ep_id, doctor_id, start_time, end_time, verdict, content, create_time, update_time from report
select id, ep_id, doctor_id, start_time, end_time, verdict, content, create_time, update_time from report WHERE ep_id = #{epId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select r.id as id,r.start_time as startTime,r.end_time as endTime,r.verdict as verdict,r.content as content,r.create_time as createTime,r.update_time as updateTime, u.real_name as doctorName from report r LEFT JOIN doctor d on r.doctor_id=d.id LEFT JOIN user u on u.id = d.user_id WHERE ep_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
